downloadTitle: Moving your Exchange Web Services Applications and App Registrations to an Application Access Policy Model
downloadDescription: Presentation from the Microsoft Exchange Community (MEC) Technical Airlift - September 13-14, 2022

downloadFile.name: Moving your Exchange Web Services Applications and App Registrations to an Application Access Policy Model.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/9/1/1/911f5d5c-065c-49b5-a094-eb09be55f82e/Moving your Exchange Web Services Applications and App Registrations to an Application Access Policy Model.pdf

detailsSection:
This session will detail the planning requirements and key factors to consider as you move your Exchange Web Services applications and app registrations to leverage application access policies.

Recording of presentation by Julian Stephan is at https://youtu.be/Rth8gwc1xh0.
detailsSection_file_name: Moving your Exchange Web Services Applications and App Registrations to an Application Access Policy Model.pdf
